about_the_game:
You like cats? You like Halloween? No? Then, slowly back away and avoid eye contact and we'll all forget you were here...

Still here? Purrfect! Here is your chance to be a cat. In this game you are the cat and the hero. It's Halloween and the monsters are taking over. Where did the monsters come from? How am I supposed to know? I'm just a cat! You'll get all the abilities that us normal cats have like sleeping, running, climbing, jumping, hairballs, controlling people and casting magic. Use your amazing cat powers to save the town, explore the dungeons and collect awesome treasures, or just... be a cat. It's all up to you. Have fun!

Key Features
  • explore a huge interactive open world
  • Investigate the depths of crypts and the tunnels in the subways to unlock powers and fight off the monsters.
  • Each character can access unique powerful artifacts that aligns with their elements
  • Character progression and development to improve your strength, health and magic
  • Plenty of interactive characters and quests

Use your amazing cat powers to save the town, explore the dungeons and collect awesome treasures, or just... be a cat. It's all up to you. Have fun!

name: Cat Saves Halloween

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHZ Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You are no ordinary cat but a magical cat. It's Halloween and you must save everyone from the Monsters in this action-adventure game. Maybe you don't want to save the world and that's ok too. You can just cause chaos around town while monsters are taking over.
